app.title: Healthy Homes Practitioner App
app.intro: This tool helps field workers assess housing-related health risks and social needs.

sdoh.title: Resident SDOH Questionnaire
sdoh.utilityShutoff: Have your utilities been shut off in the past year?
sdoh.foodInsecurity: How often do you worry about running out of food?
sdoh.incomeLevel: What is your monthly household income?

consent.title: Consent & Signature
consent.explained: I consent to a home inspection to assess health and safety conditions, understand this is voluntary, and agree that photos may be taken for documentation purposes.
consent.name: Resident Name (serves as consent confirmation):
